title: Dance With The Devil - Novel Updates
tags: Angels   Antihero Protagonist   Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Calm Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Demons   Discrimination   Famous Protagonist   Fantasy Creatures   Kidnappings   Loner Protagonist   Magic   Mismatched Couple   Mythical Beasts   Power Couple   Power Struggle   R-18   Shapeshifters   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Succubus   Transformation Ability   Wars   Wealthy Characters
author: Miu   美雨
description: The demon who looked like an angel, Duke Valafar, was discriminated by other demons due to his appearance, causing him to become a shut-in in his castle. The only one by his side was an incubus subordinate. One day, when a blood-stained angel fell in his territory, he met Archangel Uriel. Kidnapped by Uriel, the fate of Valafar who was added to the harem is…!?>
